title: Women representation in law firms
summary: This chart shows the percentage of Women who are employed by companies across different Sector .
The Insurance Sector is the highest employers of Women with approximately 65 percentage of staff being female .
This is followed closely by the Tech Sector with just over 60 percentage female representation .
gold: The graph shows the representation of woman in different sectors . This shows that women are less likely to be employed by law firms than financial groups , tech and insurance .
